data.title: German satirical magazine 'Titanic': "If you shoot at satirists, you only make our work more relevant". Put satirical message on their website, telling terrorists when to come.
Ahmed Merabet, Cop Killed In Paris Attacks, Was Muslim
ISIS behead street magician for entertaining crowds in Syria with his tricks
Danish newspaper to print Charlie Hebdo cartoons on Islam

Vladimir Putin has condemned a deadly terrorist attack in Paris, and confirmed Moscow’s readiness to continue cooperation with France in battling terrorism. Putin also expressed his condolences to the victims' families and wished the injured a speedy recovery.
10 people have died in a shooting at the headquarters of the French satirical weekly Charlie Hebdo
Danish Paper That Published 12 Muhammad Cartoons Boosts Security

‘Respect for religion’ has become a code phrase meaning ‘fear of religion.’ Religions, like all other ideas, deserve criticism, satire, and, yes, our fearless disrespect.” –Salman Rushdie publishes support on English Pen
Massive hunt underway for gunmen in Paris terror attack
